note.p: Daughter of George and Caroline Louisa Jane Smith of Mitcham, Surrey. Married at Down, Kent, as his second wife, John Smith (1797–1853) of Down Court, in 1848.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1606/246/2
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 28 September 2018)
